author: Lon.TV
description:
Sign up for a Plex Pass - http://lon.tv/plexpass (compensated affiliate link) - ErsatzTV is an open source project that lets you schedule your own streaming live TV channel! Build out time slots, schedule programming, and recreate the TV experience of your youth. See more Plex - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIvqJPAmMooCKOHieLdi3I7o and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

ErsatzTV - https://ersatztv.org/

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
03:11 - Download Options
05:05 - Hardware Acceleration
06:12 - Connect ErsatzTV to Plex
08:21 - Setting up filler media
09:42 - Understanding Media Collections
12:33 - Making a Channel
14:07 - Scheduling
17:59 - Last step: Build a playout
18:26 - Setting up channel on Plex
19:53 - Watching our TV channel

title: Make Your Own Streaming TV Channel with Plex and ErsatzTV !
